title: Design Thinking Disposition Cultivation Education: Self-Directed Learning Based on a Conceptual Model

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic design thinking principles and professional practical experience
context.additional_context: Learner cohort of medical/legal/technical professionals without PC access; smartphone-based learning required with customized education for language domain application

learning_goals: Learners can apply the four core elements of design thinking disposition (empathy, problem definition, idea generation, experimental mindset) in practical settings.
Learners can systematically develop a design thinking disposition using conceptual models in a self-directed learning environment.
Learners can measure and improve changes in their design thinking disposition through reflective journaling.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
